name: Nani's Dreamworld
description:
Nani's Dreamworld

Help Nani, she just wants to get home. 

Nani can not distinguish between dreams and reality. She has the gift to look into the dream world, so she gets further than most.

Use her gift to bring her home.

Controls:

Move/Jump:                                           Arrow Keys/AWD

Look into the dream world:         Left Mouse Button

Energy Boost                                        E/Spacebar (can only be used when Mouse Button not pressed)

Energy Bar:
Energy is lost while you look into the Dreamworld. It will restore over time or you can use an EnergyBooster, which you can collect around the world

Team:

Kyunru...Hand-drawn Art, Game Design, Game Programming and everything else :)
